member.name: T:WeatherApp.Helpers.RelayCommand
member.summary: A command that relays its execution logic to the provided delegates. Implements the interface for use in XAML or MVVM patterns.

member.name: E:WeatherApp.Helpers.RelayCommand.CanExecuteChanged
member.summary: Occurs when changes occur that affect whether or not the command can execute.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The execution status logic, as a . Optional.

member.name: M:WeatherApp.Helpers.RelayCommand.CanExecute(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines the method that determines whether the command can execute in its current state.
member.param: Data used by the command. This parameter is not used.
member.returns: true if this command can be executed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:WeatherApp.Helpers.RelayCommand.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines the method to be called when the command is invoked.
member.param: Data used by the command. This parameter is not used.

member.name: M:WeatherApp.Helpers.RelayCommand.RaiseCanExecuteChnged
member.summary: Raises the event to notify that the execution status has changed.
